user.title: Add Smart Appliance Monitor
user.description: Configure monitoring for your appliance. Note: Energy price is now configured globally via the set_global_config service.

data_description.appliance_name: Descriptive name for your appliance (e.g. Oven, Dishwasher)
data_description.power_sensor: Power sensor from the smart plug (W)
data_description.energy_sensor: Energy sensor from the smart plug (kWh)

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure {appliance_name}
reconfigure.description: Modify the base settings for the appliance. Statistics will be preserved. Note: Energy price is now configured globally via the set_global_config service.

data_description.appliance_name: Descriptive name for your appliance (e.g. Oven, Dishwasher)
data_description.appliance_type: Type of appliance - thresholds will adapt automatically
data_description.power_sensor: Power sensor from the smart plug (W)
data_description.energy_sensor: Energy sensor from the smart plug (kWh)

abort.reconfigure_successful: Reconfiguration successful! The integration has been reloaded with the new settings.

init.title: Detection Thresholds
init.description: Configure power thresholds to detect when your appliance starts and stops. These values depend on your appliance type.

data_description.start_threshold: Minimum power consumption to detect appliance starting (e.g., 100W for oven, 10W for washing machine)
data_description.stop_threshold: Maximum power consumption to detect appliance stopping (e.g., 10W for oven, 5W for washing machine)

delays.title: Detection Delays & Alerts
delays.description: Configure how long the power must remain stable before confirming a state change, and alert settings.

data_description.start_delay_minutes: How long power must stay above threshold before confirming start (0.5-10 min)
data_description.stop_delay_minutes: How long power must stay below threshold before confirming stop (0.5-30 min)
data_description.enable_alert_duration: Get notified if the cycle runs longer than expected
data_description.alert_duration_hours: Maximum cycle duration before triggering an alert (0.5-24 hours)
data_description.expert_mode: Access advanced settings (unplugged detection timeout, custom notification service)

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Choose which notification services to use and which events to be notified about.

data_description.notification_services: Select one or more services: Mobile App, Telegram, Persistent notification, or Custom service
data_description.notification_types: Select which events trigger notifications: cycle started, finished, duration alert, or unplugged

expert.title: Expert Settings
expert.description: Advanced configuration for power users. These settings are optional and have sensible defaults.

data_description.unplugged_timeout_minutes: Duration at 0W before considering appliance unplugged (1-60 min, default: 5 min)
data_description.custom_notify_service: Full service name for custom notifications (e.g., notify.my_custom_service)
